DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess impact different parameter ( voltage , pulse width , frequency ) subthalamic nucleus ( STN ) deep brain stimulation ( DBS ) motor symptoms patient Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Study Effects Different Parameters Motor Symptoms PD Bilateral STN Stimulation
DOC.detailed_description: In observational study , retrospectively analyze one-year follow-up data 27 PD patient receive bilateral STN DBS First Affiliated Hospital Sun Yat-sen University year 2008-2012 . The data , include parameter setting severity motor symptom indicate Unified Parkinson 's Disease Rating Scale ( UPDRS ) Part III score , collect patient ' annual visit hospital reprogramming . A correlation analysis conduct investigate relationship change specific parameter subsequent change motor score .
DOC.criteria: PD patient treat bilateral STN DBS First Affiliated Hospital year 20082012 Simultaneous participation another clinical trial Dementia ( Mini Mental State Examination < 26 ) Removal DBS electrodes Loss followup
